hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
from DataModelEntity where 1=1 <if isNotBlank( system )> and system = :system </if> <if isNotBlank( type )> and type = :type </if> <if isNotBlank( keyword )> and ( name like '%' || :keyword || '%' or id like '%' || :keyword || '%'
) </if> <if isNotBlank(whereSql)> and ${whereSql} </if> <if isNotBlank( orderBy )> ${orderBy} </if>
